meanings.definition: Opened or undone by pulling a zipper.
meanings.sent1: The unzipped jacket kept me warm on the chilly day.
meanings.sent2: She wore an unzipped hoodie to the park.
meanings.sent3: The unzipped bag spilled its contents all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The unzipped book revealed a hidden note inside.
meanings.sent5: The unzipped tent flapped in the wind, inviting us inside.

meanings.definition: Revealed or exposed by opening a zipper.
meanings.sent1: He unzipped the suitcase to find his passport.
meanings.sent2: She quickly unzipped her backpack to grab her lunch.
meanings.sent3: The magician unzipped the curtain to reveal his assistant.
meanings.sent4: The detective unzipped the mystery, solving the case.
meanings.sent5: The artist unzipped his creativity, painting a masterpiece.
